Text: ABSOLUTELY A GREAT ALBUM.  HE PUTS A WHOLE NEW SPIN ON BZ's SONGS AND I LOVE IT.

Total rubbish!
If Dylan was dead, he's be spinning in his grave. Ferry has slaughtered these songs; he should be ashamed of himself for what he's done.

Yes number 666, did your boyfriend tell you to say that? Well, you're both Wrong!

This is total rubbish!
If Dylan were dead, he'd be spinning in his grave. 
Ferry has slaughtered these songs; he should be ashamed of himself for what he's done.
And I always thought only Dylan could sing Dylan. This is the exception to the rule.
